title: <article>
description: The `<article>` HTML element represents an independent piece of content that can be independently distributed or reused, such as a blog post or news article.
content: The element that represents a self-contained piece of content, such as a blog post, news article or forum entry. Itâ€™s designed to be independently distributable or reusable and often includes related elements like headings, paragraphs and media.
